UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Antimicrobial and antibiofilm activity of cathelicidins and short, synthetic peptides against Francisella.
Literature.Author: Amer LS, Bishop BM, van Hoek ML

Literature.Title: Short, Synthetic Cationic Peptides Have Antibacterial Activity against Mycobacterium smegmatis by Forming Pores in Membrane and Synergizing with Antibiotics.
Literature.Author: Gupta K, Singh S, van Hoek ML

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Francisella tularensis subsp. novicida BEI NR-13(EC50=147.9µg/ml),Mycobacterium smegmatis mc2-155(EC50=>100µg/ml),Mycobacterium smegmatis mc2-155(MIC=>125µg/ml)
